page.title: 08Aboyne Golf Club
page.content: The golf{club}was formed in 1889. The present building replaced the previous corrugated building in the mid 1970's. The course is short with par 66 (5330 yrds) for men and 71 (5087 yrds) for ladies. The{golf course}has contrasting halves the first half being in the style of an English inland course with numerous rows of trees pushing the inaccurate drive. The second half resembles a links course with a poor lie always possible on even the straightest drive and with much sandy dry earth on the fairways. The club has a permanent greenkeeping staff and last season installed a pipe system for watering the greens. The {club house}is not only for{golf,}it holds functions and dances as well as being a popular place to eat out in the evening.
